form.subject: gen0Syme: syme unallocated by gen0Vars
form.description:
In addition to bug #1367, which can be solved by keeping strictly to the specification in the aldor user guide by adding a "add" clause or un-commenting the #include "algebra" a compiler bug "gen0Syme: syme unallocated by gen0Vars" can be observed, by using both.
N.B.: Again this bug occurrs with version 1.0.1 and also 1.0.2 (which cannot be selected as "compiler version" of the bug report form)
